document.full_text: the rangers clinched the eighth seed in the playoffs with tampa bay defeating carolina 6-2. the rangers await the top-seeded washington capitals in the first round.
document.title: rangers 5, devils 2: win, wait, then off to playoffs for rangers
lines_and_colors: the rangers clinched the eighth seed in the playoffs with tampa bay defeating carolina 6-2. the rangers await the top-seeded washington capitals in the first round.
